sentence.Network_en: He wore very dark blue shirts, a lemon - yellow tie, and horn - rimmed glasses.
sentence.Network_cn: 他穿着非常深的蓝色衬衫, 系一条柠檬黄的领带, 戴着一副角质框架的眼镜.

sentence.Network_en: Yes, they are a pair of brown ladies horn rimmed glasses with blur tinted lenses.
sentence.Network_cn: 好的, 那是一副色角质镜框女用眼镜,蓝色镜片.

entry.def: Horn-rimmed glasses have plastic frames that look as though they are made of horn.

means.word_mean: 1. having the frame made of horn or tortoise shell or plastic that simulates either;
